lead_paragraph: Atlantic City's mayor said Monday he cannot agree to massive tax reductions sought by the owners of the Trump Taj Mahal Casino Resort, throwing into serious doubt an already long-shot plan by billionaire Carl Icahn to buy and save the casino and its 2,800 jobs.

headline.main: AP: Mayor Nixes Tax Break to Save Taj Mahal Casino
headline.print_headline: AP: Mayor Nixes Tax Break to Save Taj Mahal Casino
